setting.description: A modern, glass-walled conference room with a spectacular city view. A large screen dominates one wall.

elements.content: EMMA stands at the head of the table, clicker in hand. ZOE fidgets with her laptop. JACK and DEREK sit, watching expectantly.

elements.line: Gentlemen, thank you for coming. We're about to change the future of transportation.

elements.content: Emma clicks. The screen lights up with sleek designs of futuristic vehicles.

elements.line: We've heard that before, Ms. Chen. What makes your... hover-cars different?

elements.content: ZOE startles, then stands, moving to the screen.

elements.parenthetical: nervous at first, then gaining confidence
elements.line: Our propulsion system uses a revolutionary quantum levitation technology. It's not just more efficient; it's completely sustainable.
It generates its own energy during flight. Essentially, the more you use it, the more efficient it becomes.
That's what they said about the light bulb, the telephone, the internet. Zoe, show them the prototype.

elements.content: ZOE taps on her laptop. A low hum fills the room. Outside the window, a sleek, car-sized object rises into view, hovering silently.
JACK and DEREK rush to the window, amazed.

elements.line: Gentlemen, welcome to the future. Shall we discuss numbers?

elements.content: JACK and DEREK exchange a look, then turn back to EMMA, nodding eagerly.
